snippet: The Lede rounded up reaction to Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey on Thursday night, with additional fact-checking and context provided by Juliet Macur, Sarah Lyall and David Carr.
abstract: The Lede rounded up reaction to Lance Armstrong’s interview with Oprah Winfrey on Thursday night, with additional fact-checking and context provided by Juliet Macur, Sarah Lyall and David Carr.
